value.name: Family of man fatally shot by Las Vegas police plan on suing the city
value.description: LAS VEGAS (KTNV) — The City of Las Vegas has been given notice that a lawsuit will be filed in connection to the death of Justin Charland who was shot several times by Las Vegas police outside ...

value.name: Las Vegas police release images of fatal shooting at complex
value.description: Assistant Sheriff Brett Zimmerman said during a news briefing Friday that police during previous encounters with Justin Charland had arranged for the 40-year-old man to receive mental health ...
